title: Canada : average family size 2000 to 2017
summary: In general Average number of people has stayed the same over the Year.
Average number of people is roughly constant from 2000 to 2003, gradually decreasing from 2003 to 2004, and lastly roughly constant from 2004 to 2012.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2003 and 2004.
The highest Average number of people, of value 3.0 was reached at Year 2000,  2001,  2002, and 2003
Minimum Average number of people about 2.9 was reached at Year 2004,  2005,  2006,  2007,  2008,  2009,  2010,  2011, and 2012
